release.change: New: Auto Rotate and Adaptive Brightness fix for those who are experiencing auto-rotate and auto-brightness not working after turning on screen. You may have to give auto-rotate/brightness a few seconds to adjust. Go to Menu > Settings > Auto-rotate/brightness fix and enable

New: View Debug logs (requires root) - You can now view application logs for debug purposes (ex: see if the app's working properly or not) and share the app log or full logcat. Go to Menu > Settings > Debug logs to view
Fixed: Crash when removing an item from whitelist
